t: Purina continues momentum in first half of 2024 | Pet Food Processing
s: July 25, 2024 - VEVEY, SWITZERLAND — Nestlé released its financial results for the first half of 2024, highlighting the Purina Petcare business as a leading growth contributor. The business achieved total sales of CHF 9.45 billion ($10.74 billion USD) in the first half of 2024, a slight increase from CHF 9.37 billion ($10.64 billion USD) in the first half of 2023.
